Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.config

Class MongoConfig

java.lang.Object
linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.config.MongoConfig
@Configuration @EnableReactiveMongoRepositories(basePackages="linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes") public class MongoConfig extends Object
Configuration class for setting up MongoDB with reactive support.
